jobDescription: Do you thrive on using data to provide key insights to an organization? Do you take initiative to identify what an organization should be measuring and evaluating? Are you a thoughtful problem solver who is able to make actionable recommendations?  Sauce Labs provides the world's largest cloud-based platform for the automated testing of web and mobile applications. Its award-winning service eliminates the time and expense of maintaining an in-house testing infrastructure, freeing development teams of any size to innovate and release better software, faster. About the Position As the Data Analyst on our Data Science team you will be the analytical data partner for our Sales, Marketing and Customer Success Organizations. This newly created position is critical to drive company growth, understanding customer behaviors and patterns and getting actionable insights to predict trends.
